Loan Second Hand XUV 3XO Mahindra XUV 3XO Specifications The Mahindra XUV 3XO has 1 Diesel Engine and 1 Petrol Engine on offer. The Diesel engine is 1498 cc while the Petrol engine is 1197 cc . It is available with Manual & Automatic transmission.Depending upon the variant and fuel type the XUV 3XO has a mileage of 17.96 to 20.6 kmpl. The XUV 3XO is a 5 seater 3 cylinder car and has length of 3990 mm, width of 1821 mm and a wheelbase of 2600. Read More 4.6 303 Reviews Shortlist Rs. 7.99 - 15.80 Lakh * EMI starts @ 21,545 View July Offers Ad Standout features of Mahindra XUV 3XO Soft touch material on dashboard and door pads. Panoramic sunroof - largest in the segment. Level 2 ADAS with features such as forward collision warning, adaptive cruise control. 1.2-litre turbo-petrol engine makes 130PS/230Nm most powerful in its class. 'content': "Open menu All Find a car Find a bike News Reviews Features Galleries Stories Advice Home cars mahindra xuv 3xo specifications Last Updated on: 29 May 2025 XUV 3XO Price Mileage Expert Reviews Specs Variants Images Colours Videos Fuel Cost FAQs EMI More Mahindra XUV 3XO specifications Autocar score 8 9.06 - 18.40 Lakh On road price, Delhi Delhi Starting 13,193 /month EMI calculator Get EMI offers Enquire now Mahindra XUV 3XO highlights The XUV 3XO gets two petrol and one diesel engine option. The entry-level XUV 3XO gets a 1.2-liter turbo MPFI petrol engine while the higher variants come with a 1.2-liter turbo direct injection petrol. Additionally, there is a 1.5-liter diesel engine on offer on the XUV 3XO as well. Mahindra XUV 3XO on road price starts from Rs 8.50 lakh going upto Rs 17.84 lakh for the top model diesel automatic variant. The more powerful petrol engine on offer on the XUV 3XO is the 1.2 TGDI version that churns out a healthy 130hp and 230Nm. It can be opted with either a six-speed manual or a six-speed automatic. Mahindra XUV 3XO mileage for the 1.2 TGDI petrol ranges from 20.1kpl for the manual and 18.2kpl for the automatic. This engine is available on the XUV 3XO AX5 L, the AX7 and the AX7 L variants. 5-star Bharat NCAP Safety Rating Compact SUV of the Year: Autocar Awards 2025 Mahindra XUV 3XO key specifications The Mahindra XUV 3XO offers a choice of three engines: 1.2L turbo petrol with 110 PS, 1.2L TGDi turbo petrol with 130 PS, and 1.5L diesel with 117 PS, paired with manual, AMT, and 6-speed torque converter options. It features a spacious 385-litre boot, a 10.25-inch touchscreen, and a panoramic sunroof which is the widest in the segment. With over 60 connected car features and Level 2 ADAS, it is a tech-loaded compact SUV. Fuel Type Diesel, Petrol Engine Displacement 1197 cc - 1497 cc Body Style SUV Seats 5 Transmission Type Manual, TC, AMT Mileage 17.96kpl - 21.2kpl Mahindra XUV 3XO specifications Variant Select variant Mahindra XUV 3XO stands out with its refined and robust exterior design. Check it out from different angles in our vast image gallery. nodes.agent_prompt: Find 5-7 URLs that discuss or list the features of Mahindra XUV 3XO. Focus on official sources like Mahindra's website, reputable car review sites, and automotive news outlets. Refine search to get URLs with maximum information.

Reviews Specs Variants Images Colours Videos Fuel Cost FAQs EMI More Mahindra XUV 3XO specifications Autocar score 8 9.06 - 18.40 Lakh On road price, Delhi Delhi Starting 13,193 /month EMI calculator Get EMI offers Enquire now Mahindra XUV 3XO highlights The XUV 3XO gets two petrol and one diesel engine option. The entry-level XUV 3XO gets a 1.2-liter turbo MPFI petrol engine while the higher variants come with a 1.2-liter turbo direct injection petrol. Additionally, there is a 1.5-liter diesel engine on offer on the XUV 3XO as well. Mahindra XUV 3XO on road price starts from Rs 8.50 lakh going upto Rs 17.84 lakh for the top model diesel automatic variant. The more powerful petrol engine on offer on the XUV 3XO is the 1.2 TGDI version that churns out a healthy 130hp and 230Nm. It can be opted with either a six-speed manual or a six-speed automatic. Mahindra XUV 3XO mileage for the 1.2 TGDI petrol ranges from 20.1kpl for the manual and 18.2kpl for the automatic. This engine is available on the XUV 3XO AX5 L, the AX7 and the AX7 L variants. 5-star Bharat NCAP Safety Rating Compact SUV of the Year: Autocar Awards 2025 Mahindra XUV 3XO key specifications The Mahindra XUV 3XO offers a choice of three engines: 1.2L turbo petrol with 110 PS, 1.2L TGDi turbo petrol with 130 PS, and 1.5L diesel with 117 PS, paired with manual, AMT, and 6-speed torque converter options. It features a spacious 385-litre boot, a 10.25-inch touchscreen, and a panoramic sunroof which is the widest in the segment. With over 60 connected car features and Level 2 ADAS, it is a tech-loaded compact SUV. nodes.description: Expand URL List with more specific details on Mahindra XUV 3XO features.
nodes.agent_prompt: Based on the URLs from T001, identify and retrieve additional URLs that provide detailed specifications, feature lists, and reviews of Mahindra XUV 3XO. Prioritize URLs from expert review sites and user reviews.

nodes.description: Extract detailed feature information from the URLs gathered in T001 and T002.
nodes.agent_prompt: From the URLs provided in T001 and T002 outputs, extract detailed information about the features of Mahindra XUV 3XO, including but not limited to: engine specifications, safety features, infotainment system details, comfort features, and available accessories.  Structure the information in a clear, organized way, noting the source URL for each piece of information.

nodes.description: Synthesize and Format Feature Information into a Report.
nodes.agent_prompt: Synthesize the feature information extracted from T003 into a well-structured report. Organize the information into categories (e.g., Engine, Safety, Infotainment, Comfort). Include a brief description of each feature and its benefits. Format the report in an easy-to-read HTML format.
